# Automations Impacted by the "Visitors" Input Boolean

*This document was generated by an AI and may contain inaccuracies. Please
verify the information before use.*

This document lists all the automations that are impacted by the
`input_boolean.visitors` value. This input boolean is used to indicate that
there are guests in the house, which prevents certain automations from
running.

## Away Mode and Presence Simulation Automations

All alarm and presence simulation automations are disabled when
`input_boolean.visitors` is `on`. This is to prevent false alarms when guests
are present. For a detailed explanation of these automations, please see the
[Alarm and Presence Simulation Automations](alarms.md) documentation.

The following automations from the [`away_mode.yaml`](away_mode.yaml) file are
impacted by the `input_boolean.visitors` value:

* [**Switch Away mode on when we are away for more than an hour**](away_mode.yaml#L58):
  This automation will not run if `input_boolean.visitors` is `on`.
* [**Motion detected**](away_mode.yaml#L151): This automation will not run if
  `input_boolean.visitors` is `on`.
* [**Door openned while away**](away_mode.yaml#L234): This automation will not
  run if `input_boolean.visitors` is `on`.
* [**Mouvement detected while away**](away_mode.yaml#L294): This automation
  will not run if `input_boolean.visitors` is `on`.
* [**Lights switched on while away**](away_mode.yaml#L341): This automation
  will not run if `input_boolean.visitors` is `on`.
* [**Presence simulation Bureau**](away_mode.yaml#L376): This automation will
  not run if `input_boolean.visitors` is `on`.
* [**Presence simulation Aurore's bedroom**](away_mode.yaml#L411): This
  automation will not run if `input_boolean.visitors` is `on`.

## Vacuum Cleaner Automations

The following vacuum cleaner automation is impacted by the
`input_boolean.visitors` value:

* [**vacuum Kitchen and dining room when we are away (Covid version)**](vacuumCleaner.yaml#L143):
  This automation will not run if `input_boolean.visitors` is `on`. This is to
  prevent the vacuum cleaner from disturbing guests.
